response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Given its significance, we are considering offering it to you at a special price of $12,500. This represents a significant saving compared to its original valuation, while still ensuring that we receive a fair return for our investment. We believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement that respects both the worth of the product and your financial considerations. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.", "product_price": 12500}
